div.p: This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

td.a: One JE primary series dose was administered-111

tr.td: One JE primary series dose was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

td.a: Second JE dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-88

tr.td: Second JE dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines")

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SJEInactivatedVeroCellDerivedVaccine for IMMZ.D18.S.JE.Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccination schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a Japanese encephalitis (JE) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccination schedule (2-dose scheme)

code.value: One JE primary series dose was administered-111

display.value: One JE primary series dose was administered

code.value: Second JE dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-88

display.value: Second JE dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

display.value: One JE primary series dose was administered
